front.title: A BGP Cease Notification Subcode For Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD)

abstract.t: The Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) protocol is used to detect loss of connectivity between two forwarding engines, typically with low latency. BFD is leveraged by routing protocols, including the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP), to bring down routing protocol connections faster than the native protocol timers. This document defines a Subcode for the BGP Cease NOTIFICATION message for when a BGP connection is being closed due to a BFD session going down.
